cboCostEstimates.description: As ordered reported by the House Committee on Foreign Affairs on February 9, 2022
cboCostEstimates.title: H.R. 6552, Frederick Douglass Trafficking Victims Prevention and Protection Reauthorization Act of 2022

constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 168, Number 20 (Tuesday, February 1, 2022)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. SMITH of New Jersey:
H.R. 6552.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article 1 Section 8 of the U.S. Constitution
[Page H331]

latestAction.text: Received in the Senate and Read twice and referred to the Committee on Foreign Relations.

title: Frederick Douglass Trafficking Victims Prevention and Protection Reauthorization Act of 2022
